adDetails: Hi there, im a young outgoing 23 year old photographer who is looking to do a free wedding to build up my portfolio. Consider me as a extra second photographer for the event but not the main photographer. I would try to do my best to take the best picture as possible. I would send you all the photos and edit 20 best pictures of the wedding. I mean its free, you can't go wrong here. Let me know! email me and tell me details about it. Weddings only please.
